sentences.en: Clean clothes and good manners are prepossessing.
sentences.cn: 清洁的衣服和良好的举止能给人以好感.

sentences.en: Clean clothes and good manners prepossessing.
sentences.cn: 衣服和良好的举止能给人以好感.

sentences.en: Growing up physically small in the shadow of prepossessing Kim Il - sung can hardly have been easy.
sentences.cn: 身材矮小的他从小生活在世人瞩目的金日成的阴影下,不可能是一件易事.

sentences.en: He / His appearance is not at all prepossessing.
sentences.cn: 他[他的外表]毫无吸引力.

sentences.en: He was not a prepossessing sight.
Outside the plant from January 28 th was a less prepossessing sight.
sentences.cn: 而自1月28日以来,工厂外的景象就不那么惹人欣喜了.

sentences.en: The appearance of Frank Cowperwood at this time was, to say the least, prepossessing and satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 法兰克·柯帕乌这个时候的相貌, 至少是讨人欢喜,令人满意的.

sentences.en: Thus, unpleasant home remedies were my earliest experiences of healthcare, and I cannot prepossessing.
sentences.cn: 因而讨厌的家庭治疗就变成我的最早的家庭保健卫生的体验.

words.tran_cn: 偏爱；先入观念；全神贯注
使先具有；预先灌输情感（或思想等）；使…先怀偏见；先有好感
给人好感的；有魅力的；引人注意的

trans.tran_cn: 讨人喜欢的，有魅力的，给人好感的
使先具有( prepossess的现在分词 )
